item.title: Instalasi Linux lewat WSL
item.author: Larry Marzan Jr.
item.description: Install WSL Langkah pertama: Enable Developer Mode The first thing you need to do is enable developer mode on your Windows machine. Go to Settings -> Update and Security -> For developers,kemudian klik Developer mode Selanjutnya Install WSL. Masuk ke menu Start dan cari turn windows features on or off. Select that, then check the “Windows Subsystem for Linux (Beta)” checkbox. Install Linux lewat WSL Untuk mengetahui list disribution Linux yang tersedia secara online, buka aplikasi Powershell kemudian ketikkan:
